name: Ancient survival lost tech
description:
Ancient Survival Lost Tech is no more than a pixel frustrasting platformer. Yeah, it maybe hard, but we made it sort. And no one said fight evil spiked alien boxes to save human kind of starving  will be easy.

NOTE: As usual, some sound problems on html version that can affect performance. Try desktop version for better performance.

NOTE 2: I hope someone is old enough to get the third stage reference.

This game has been developed for the Godot Wild Jam #Jam (Lost Tech)

Controls:

Movement: A/D - Cursor keys - Gamepad

Jump: W - Space - Up cursor key - Gamepad A 

Suicide: R - Gamepad B 

Menu: Esc - Tab - Gamepad Start

Asset sources coming soon.
